attributes.action: Stop harassing people with constant text messages regarding the vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: It’s almost like we’re being bullied into booking an appointment, due to the constant barrage of text messages sent daily to our phones.
attributes.background: Stop contacting people and let us make our own minds up regarding vaccination.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about text messages relating to vaccines, however it's not clear which vaccine(s) you are referring to, nor who these messages are being sent by.

If there is a clear action you'd like the UK Government to take, you could start a petition about that.

If you do start a new petition, please note be sure to include your full, real name.
